div.p: This page describes how to use UNII with HL7 Standards.

tr.td: The URI to identify UNII codes is http://fdasis.nlm.nih.gov
If it is desired to exchange the version, use the date of the file in the UNII list download in the format YYYYMMDD
Use the value of the UNII column in the UNII List
Use the value of the PT (Preferred Term) column in the UNII List
Todo: Describe how it is determined which concepts are inactive
No Subsumption relationships are defined by UNII

div.p: UNII has no copyright acknowledgement needed, nor are there any license terms to adhere to.
No need for filters identified yet.
No need for implicit value sets identified yet.
